dj-query-catalog.title: Query with permissions
dj-query-catalog.description: a query on database 'dj/northwind' called 'group', executable for the 'authenticated' role

code.query: SELECT CUSTOMERS.COUNTRY, COUNT(*) AS "Number of Customers" FROM CUSTOMERS GROUP BY CUSTOMERS.COUNTRY

dj-query-catalog.title: Query with parameters
dj-query-catalog.description: a query on database 'northwind' called 'list'. Parameters limit and offset can be passed to the query

dj-query-catalog.title: Calling a stored procedure
dj-query-catalog.description: stored procedure 'sp' on database 'postgres' called with parameter 'test'
